lyrics.text: ~BGM~
Time to shine and I'm down to ride
I'm gonna drive until the break of dawn, wilding out
I'm on a mission grinding out, whatever it is I gotta do
Riding out until the day I meet you, I'm riding out
I look up in the sky (sky)
Asking lotta, why? (Why?)
But never let it phase me, I'm keeping good vibes
When I'm on the road, watch out for all surprises
Peach eyes and blue skies, I'll be with you on your ride
It's on the moonlight, How many songs I write
You'll be my sunlight, how could I not rely On you
Peach eyes, you're mine
As soon as I watch your eyes
Couldn't find you on my damn mind
Oh my, I'm heading into you
Would you don't mind, would you don't mind
I'm talking to you, I'm talking to you
My life's so jerky, yeah
So would you let me
To hide inside your eyes, your peach eyes
Pictures in bluer skies, I'll be with you on your ride
It's on the moonlight, how many songs I write
You'll be my sunlight, how could I not fall in love with you
Each eyes
The coldest days I've been without you
You're the one I need
You know besides, I won't find nobody
To keep my whole life with you, oh you
Pictures in bluer skies, oh it's on the moonlight
You'll be my sunlight
Peach eyes
Pictures in bluer skies, I'll be with you on your ride
It's on the moonlight, how many songs I write
You'll be my sunlight, how could I not fall in love with you
Peach eyes
Pictures in bluer skies, oh it's on the moonlight
You'll be my sunlight, how could I not fall in love with you
Peach eyes
